original_text: At that time, the Lord will use the king of Assyria to bring trouble and pain. He will come from beyond the Euphrates river. He will be like a sharp knife that cuts off all your hair, the hair from your head, your legs and your beard.
korean_text: 그 날에는 주께서 하수 저쪽에서 세내어 온 삭도 곧 앗수르 왕으로 네 백성의 머리 털과 발 털을 미실 것이요 수염도 깎으시리라

sentences.original_text: the Lord will use the king of Assyria
He will come from beyond the Euphrates river
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유브라데 강 저편에서 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will be like a sharp knife
that cuts off all your hair
